Description: Hustle in for getting started with ZORALab's Hestia to your advantage! A purpose-oriented hands-on guides for using ZORALab's Hestia Project from multiple perpectives.

Hugo.Description: The very beginning of the journey where you setup and configure the Hugo Git repository with hestiaHUGO, ZORALab's Hestia Hugo module from scratch.
Hugo.Title: Setup Hugo

Hugo.Description: The first step where you will understand how hestiaHUGO operates by creating 1 set of placeholder pages and 1 set of basic 404 pages.
Hugo.Title: Create Basic and Placeholder Hugo Pages

Title: Getting Started Catalog
